description:
Swing trading is too time consuming and risky.

Investing is too slow and brings low yields.

The solution for the investor/trader who wants a happy middle-ground? Position Trading!

My name is Damon Verial and I'd like to ask you to come with me on a journey as I take you from a beginner to an experienced position trader in three steps!

Over 3,500 students are already enrolled in my other trading courses and have left mainly five star reviews.

Why?

Because I teach - in a fun way - how to trade stocks successfully.

Are you ready to become a position trader?

This course assumes no previous experience, and takes you from the absolute beginner concepts such as showing you the tools you need to pick stocks, determine the future direction of a stock, and decide when to sell your stock.

All the essential stock fundamentals and technicals are explained in three quick-start lectures.

At the end of this course, you will have a system to successfully position trade stocks on the market, guaranteed or your money back!

Don't worry if you’ve never traded stocks before. I always answer individual questions my students have. Just ask me via the discussion forum and I’ll walk you through any concepts you find confusing.

Be sure to check the promo video to ensure this course is right for you.

As your instructor, I have over 12 years of teaching experience and have brought a $3,000 account to over $30,000 in under two years!

In short, I consider myself an expert trader but also have the relatively unique ability to make teaching fun and easy.

Don't worry, I might be an academic, but I do make trading fun and painless for you to learn!

Not convinced? Just go and take a read of some of the rave reviews given to me on my other courses.

The facts are that students love my courses and style of teaching, because it helps them reach their goals faster.

Enroll now to start your journey as a position trader!
title: The Complete Position Trading Course: Position Trading Stock
